data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ereskovsky, Alexander V., Lavrov, Dennis V., Boury-Esnault, Nicole, Vacelet, Jean (2011): Molecular and morphological description of a new species of Halisarca (Demospongiae: Halisarcida) from Mediterranean Sea and a redescription of the type species Halisarca dujardini. Zootaxa 2768: 5-31, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206842
